plot: This insightful, comedic work portrays a man who is both Deaf and African American, confronting the sometimes absurd perceptions that transpire between the hearing and the Deaf.
title: What Are You... Deaf?
plot_es: This insightful, comedic work portrays a man who is both Deaf and African American, confronting the sometimes absurd perceptions that transpire between the hearing and the Deaf.
plot_en: This insightful, comedic work portrays a man who is both Deaf and African American, confronting the sometimes absurd perceptions that transpire between the hearing and the Deaf.
